reviews.review_text: I got it for my birthday from a friend and it's a fun short VR game. I played it with my Oculus Rift DK2 and an XB360 Controller and it worked great. It's not much, but it's awesome for what it is. I think if i ever have the urge for some good old space invaders, i will propably step into my rift again.
